plot outline: Sharayu a little girl survives the car accident which killed her parents.She comes to Killari where she is admitted to a Catholic school taken care by a Priest and his assistant.Sharayu tries to convince them both that she Anagha and is been reincarnated.
title: 3:56 Killari
plot: _3:56 Killari_ (qv) is set in the backdrop of the 1993 Killari earthquake. The film tells the story of a 14 year old girl's journey to know about the mysteries of her past life.
